# Hello theme_xaringan()!

Here's a simple plot that completely matches your slides' theme,
thanks to `theme_xaringan()`!

```{r ggplot2-demo, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, fig.width = 16*0.66, fig.height = 8*0.66, dpi = 300}
library(ggplot2)
ggplot(diamonds) +
  aes(cut, fill = cut) +
  geom_bar(show.legend = FALSE) +
  labs(
    x = "Cut",
    y = "Count",
    title = "A Fancy diamonds Plot"
  ) +
  theme_xaringan() +
  scale_xaringan_fill_discrete()
```
